body.name: Smart Toilet Bidet with Tank,Auto Open/Close Lid,Heated seat,Dual Auto Flush, Foot Sensor Operation,LED Display,Modern Elongated One Piece Bidet Toilets for Bathrooms E18PRO
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 18 mins
features: 【No Water Pressure Limit】The combination of a water tank and a powerful pump-assisted delivers peak flush performance every time.Perfect for homes with low water pressure.
【Hands-free Operation】Auto open lid when approaching, auto flush and close lid when leaving. Foot sensor to open/close the seat & lid, also to activate flushing, more convenient.
【High-efficiency Flush】One startup activates siphonic and jet flushing for double cleansing, to ensure thorough and efficient cleaning.
【Various Washing Methods】Self-cleaning wand offers adjustable spray shape, position, water pressure, temperature, pulsate, and oscillate functions.
【More Humanized Design】ECO energy savings mode ensures electricity is never wasted.Full or half flush(1.6GPF/1.1GPF) can save water and money.
【Convenient Features】Heated seat, nightlight, deodorization, instant warm water, warm-dryer and LED display, plus a remote control.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EPLO E18PRO Tank Built In • Pump-assisted • Auto Open/Close

Built-in Water Tank and Pump No Water Pressure Limit ● Powerful Flush ● Built-in Tank water tank and pump to achieve powerful flushing. ● Siphonic Jet Flushing TECH provide strong flushing power. Siphoning before jetting, it can be ensure thorough and efficient cleaning. Hands-free Operation Auto Open/Close&Foot Sensor Operation ● The lid will auto open when you lean within 3 ft, and will auto close lid&seat when it no longer detects you. ● Foot sensor to open/close the seat & lid, also to activate flushing, more convenient. ● For Seat Postion: Auto Open Lid>>Using>>Off-seat Flush>>Auto Close Lid ● For Stand Postion：Auto Open Lid>>Foot Sensor Open Seat>>Using>>Foot Sensor Flush>>Auto Close Seat/Lid

More User-friendly Settings No Worries about Forgetting Flush ● Smarter Flush ● When leaving the seat,the smart toilet will deliver flush automatically,no bending over to operate. ● Recognize seat time >60S (stool) as dual flush, recognize seat time <60S and foot sensor flush (urine) as half flush. This ensures efficient cleaning and saves water. Immediately Activated Features when Sit ● The bowl will pre-wetting when sit to keep cleaness. ● Auto deodorizaion,creating a fresh and natural bathroom environment.

Robust Packed for Safe Delivery ● Easy to Install Unpacking & Installing Video ● One piece Smart Toilet with bidet built in. ● 95% of them have been installed at factory, leaving only a few parts that can be quickly done,easy for all people. Video Better than Words Features Overview A quick look at the various features of the E18PRO Smart Toilet. Instructions for Use Using Video In addition to the detailed operation of all functions, if some functions do not work, it is possible to misuse the remote control,or user want to turn off some function,you can also find the answer inside this video! ● Long press "OPEN/CLOSE THE LID" button to turn on/off auto lid open/close function. ● Long press "HALF FLUSH" button to turn on/off foot sensor function. ● Long press "FULL FLUSH" to turn on/off auto flush function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EPLO’s new E18Pro
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I just installed our new EPLO E-18 Pro and we love it! Installation was easy and this toilet is AMAZING! It has so many features that we love. My wife, especially loves the heated seat. When you walk in front of it, the lid raises automatically, and when you’re finished, and step away, the toilet will automatically flush, and the lid will close. The bidet function works great, and when you’re finished, the dryer will dry your bottom! There are other features, such as a nightlight, deodorizer, adjustable speeds for the dryer and the water temperature. I know I’m missing some features, but we absolutely LOVE this toilet! All the features are working as described and functioning well. It is a very modern and well designed toilet. This toilet exceeds our expectations! We are very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING Toilet Bidet!!
reviews.reviewText: The power flush is welcome- never a clog or problem with disposal of the waste. The heated seat feature was especially enjoyed by my family this cold winter.This is absolutely the finest bathroom fixture I've ever purchased.
